name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let Us Goggle That For You

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to Google searches for you to refer to LUGTFY

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extremely lightweight extension that helps users of LUGTFY pass search queries to LUGTFY and nothing else. If you wish, check out the source code at https://github.com/LUGTFY/chrome-extension
